sendMessages.label: Inqanaba lemvume elifunekayo ukuthumela umyalezo
sendMessages.tooltip: I-0 ithetha ukuba onke amalungu anokuthumela imiyalezo, kwaye inani elikhulu lithetha ukuba iimvume eziphezulu ziyafuneka

invite.label: Inqanaba lemvume elifunekayo ukumema amalungu amatsha
invite.tooltip: Seta onokuthi ameme amalungu amatsha kwigumbi

kick.label: Khangela inqanaba lemvume elifunekayo
kick.tooltip: Cwangcisa ukuba ngubani onokukhaba amalungu egumbi

roomSettings.label: Guqula inqanaba lemvume elifunwayo leseti yegumbi

PermissionSettingsContent.description: Uluhlu lweMvume yeMvume: 0-100, inqaku elikhulu lithetha iimvume eziphezulu ziyafuneka
